PackageOracle.name: DA_CONTENT_GROUP
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_CONTENT_GROUP
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.47.018337000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,asset_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,asset_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_content_group;

body.name: DA_CONTENT_GROUP
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_CONTENT_GROUP
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.47.027954000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,asset_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_content_group.add, parms=' || title_id || '|' || asset_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_content_group a
(
a.title_id
,a.asset_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.title_id
,add.asset_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_content_group.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,asset_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_content_group.del, parms=' || title_id || '|' || asset_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_content_group a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.title_id = del.title_id
AND a.asset_id = del.asset_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_content_group.del');

END del;

END da_content_group;
